metadata.title: CVE-2021-36980 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Open vSwitch (aka openvswitch) 2.11.0 through 2.15.0 has a use-after-freein decode_NXAST_RAW_ENCAP (called from ofpact_decode and ofpacts_decode)during the decoding of a RAW_ENCAP action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36980` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvswitch-common - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-pki - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-source - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-switch - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-switch-dpdk - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-test - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-testcontroller - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
openvswitch-vtep - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
python3-openvswitch - 2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvswitch package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.13.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2').
